Fault.name: BPEL/FlightScheduleProcessor.bpel
Fault.fix: Fix the process to be *either* durable or synchronous.
Fault.msg: Process "FlightScheduleProcessor" is both durable (onMessage,Receive,Wait) and synchronous.

Fault.name: BPEL/FlightScheduleProcessor.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns1:ProcessingResult" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
